summary.span: 애플리케이션이 XPS 문서의 구성 요소를 읽거나 쓸 수 있는 형식을 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 인터페이스 및 주요 부분을 나타내는 형식 외에 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서를 디지털 서명과 의디지털RightsManagement(DRM)를포함하여패키징프로세스에대한제어를제공하는네임스페이스[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]문서.In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, the namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. 자세한 내용은 참조는 사양 XPS (XML Paper)에서 다운로드할 수 있습니다 [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)합니다.For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: Open Packaging Conventions의 디지털 서명 프레임 워크

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
